title: Dr. Fenggang Zhang Math Scholarship Endowment
Description:: The Dr. Fenggang Zhang Math Scholarship Endowment is available to continuing full-time students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.5 and majoring in mathematics to be eligible for this award.

title: Dr. Magdalena Caproiu Scholarship of Excellence(Osher)
Description:: The Dr. Magdalena Caproiu Scholarship of Excellence(Osher) is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have completed 24 or more “degree applicable” units, receiving Board of Governors(BOG) Fee Waiver, have a minimum GPA of 2.5 and show involvement in community service or extracurricular activities to be eligible for this award.

title: Dr. Thomas G. Roberts Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Dr. Thomas G. Roberts Memorial Scholarship is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 2.5 and majoring business, multimedia, graphics, and photography to be eligible for this award.

title: First Solar Scholarship (Osher)
Description:: The First Solar Scholarship (Osher) is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have completed 24 or more “degree applicable” units, receiving Board of Governors(BOG) Fee Waiver, have a minimum GPA of 2.5 and priority will be given geographically, then by need to be eligible for this award.  Priority will be given to students residing in Antelope Acres, Fairmont, Neenach and Oso, if no eligible candidates, the scholarship will be given to worthy candidates residing elsewhere in the Antelope Valley.

title: Fran and Hernando Marroquin "Changing Lives" Scholarship (Osher)
Description:: The Fran and Hernando Marroquin "Changing Lives" Scholarship (Osher) is available to continuing part-time students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have completed 24 or more “degree applicable” units, receiving Board of Governors(BOG) Fee Waiver and have a minimum GPA of 2.5 to be eligible for this award.

title: Frank and Ida Bernatt Family Scholarship Endowment
Description:: The Frank and Ida Bernatt Family Scholarship Endowment is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 2.5 to be eligible for this award.  Preference given to a physically or learning-disabled student.

title: James "Jim" McDonald Jr. Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The James "Jim" McDonald Jr. Memorial Scholarship is available to students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0 and career focus is working with kids/young adults to be eligible for this award.

title: The Johnny "Cadillac" Peak Scholarship
Description:: The The Johnny "Cadillac" Peak Scholarship is available to students at Antelope Valley College.  You must be transferring to a 4-year school, minimum GPA of 2.5 and majoring in music/theater to be eligible for this award.  Preference given to students interested in Commercial Music.

title: KYPAV Scholarship for Community Involvement
Description:: The KYPAV Scholarship for Community Involvement is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must be transferring to a 4-year school and have a minimum GPA of 2.5 to be eligible for this award.

title: Nickolas Lee Smith Memorial Scholarship Endowment
Description:: The Nickolas Lee Smith Memorial Scholarship Endowment is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0, majoring mechanical or electrical engineering involved in community service to be eligible for this award.

title: Patti Garrahy Memorial Scholarship-Interior Design
Description:: The Patti Garrahy Memorial Scholarship-Interior Design is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0 and majoring in clothing and textiles, interior design to be eligible for this award.

title: Phil Zimmerman Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Phil Zimmerman Memorial Scholarship is available to continuing full-time students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 2.5 and an active volunteer in the community and/or AVC to be eligible for this award.

title: Phillip Guevara Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Phillip Guevara Memorial Scholarship is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0 and enrolled in the registered nursing program to be eligible for this award.

title: R. Gregg Anderson Scholarship
Fields of Study:: Construction Field, Electrician, Air Conditioning/Refrigeration, Landscape Construction
Description:: The R. Gregg Anderson Scholarship is available to continuing full-time students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0 and majoring in construction field, electrician, air conditioning/refrigeration or landscape construction

title: Robert C. and Joyce F. Wilson Scholarship Endowment
Description:: The Robert C. and Joyce F. Wilson Scholarship Endowment is available to continuing full-time students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0 to be eligible for this award.

title: Roger Persons Memorial Scholarship - Kiwanis Club of Palmdale Endowment
Description:: The Roger Persons Memorial Scholarship - Kiwanis Club of Palmdale Endowment is available to continuing full-time students at Antelope Valley College.  You must be a local high school graduate, minimum GPA of 2.5 and enrolled in a nursing program to be eligible for this award.

title: Rosa and Tim Fuller Alas Scholarship Endowment
Description:: The Rosa and Tim Fuller Alas Scholarship Endowment is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 2.75, transferring to a 4-year school, completed at least 24 college units and enrolled in the study abroad program to be eligible for this award.

title: Seth Harris Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Seth Harris Memorial Scholarship is available to students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 2.5. transferring to a 4-year school and in the OSD program to be eligible for this award.  Preference will be given to students with learning disabilities, students with other disabilities are invited to apply, as well.

title: The Student Servant Leadership Scholarship
Description:: The Student Servant Leadership Scholarship is available to students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have completed 5 college units, minimum GPA of 2.5, transferring to a 4-year school and an ASO member, Student Activities Council (SAC) member, or a campus related chartered student club to be eligible for this award.

title: The Boeing Company Scholarship
Description:: The The Boeing Company Scholarship is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must be transferring to a 4-year school, minimum GPA of 3.0 and majoring in math, science or education to be eligible for this award.

title: The Seiwell Family Music Scholarship Endowment
Description:: The Seiwell Family Music Scholarship Endowment is available to students at Antelope Valley College.  You must play in the orchestra, audition and interview for award and have a minimum GPA of 2.5 to be eligible for this award.

title: Union Bank Business Scholarship
Description:: The Union Bank Business Scholarship is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0 and majoring in business and accounting to be eligible for this award.  Preference given to students with plans to open a local business.

title: Vets4Veterans Scholarship
Description:: The Vets4Veterans Scholarship is available to students at Antelope Valley College.  You must provide DD214 during interview and a minimum GPA of 2.5 to be eligible for this award.

title: Walt and Ginger Woltosz Tutor Scholarship (Osher)
Description:: The Walt and Ginger Woltosz Tutor Scholarship (Osher) is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have completed 24 or more “degree applicable” units, receiving Board of Governors(BOG) Fee Waiver, have been a tutor during the current academic year and have a minimum GPA of 3.0 to be eligible for this award.  Prefer Certified Tutor.

title: Lance Surety's $1,500 College Scholarship
Description:: The Lance Surety's $1,500 College Scholarship is available to currently enrolled undergraduate and graduate students.  You must submit an essay of no less than 500 words on one of the following topics in order to be considered for this award: "What would be your motivation to start a small business, if you could launch it right now?" or "How does the U.S. economy benefit from surety bonds?" in order to be considered for this award.

title: Baptist Ministers Dependent Scholarship
Description:: The Baptist Ministers Dependent Scholarship is open to students at Baylor University.  You must be the dependent of a pastor, minister of music, minister of education or other minister serving a Baptist congregation or a state convention to be eligible for this award.
